=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:33:40

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C17YVCD_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-23 08:51
Subject: Scheduled Maintenance for AIA and WM9 - 26/07/2025
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague, 

 

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA.

 

Maintenance start time: Saturday, July 26, 2025, | 10:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Saturday, July 26, 2025, | 11:59 PM GST

 

Please be aware that during this period, access to Warehouse Application(WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.


We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
